"Bring your memory’s light, but leave your fear outside. We trade not to forget, we trade to remember better. Where your memory finds a new harbor, we shall lay down a guiding prism and let the local lore warm it into life."
"Memory is currency, not a souvenir. We do not buy the past; we buy the chance that the past will illuminate the future."
"We do not steal memory; we borrow stories to plant new roots. The city feeds on preserved pasts, but it grows from the memory that learns to love a new name."
"We are the bridge where the old ships dock with new weather. If a memory is to sail, it must learn the language of Gleamspire’s light."

"In the ruins of the old city we find not only memories but the routes by which memory travels. We map memory drift and fight drift with ritual."

"The market rewards coherence and context. If a memory drift becomes too strong, it loses its sense of origin. The best memory is that which can travel and return, not the memory that becomes a map of Gleamspire’s own myths."
